reasoning: Modern terminology for developmental cognitive impairment. Prevalence metric used as this is a lifelong condition typically diagnosed in childhood. Global prevalence ~1-2% (1500 per 100k) based on meta-analyses. Moderate confidence due to acceptable prevalence data but diagnostic criteria variation across regions.
source: Maulik PK et al. (2011). Prevalence of intellectual disability: a meta-analysis of population-based studies. Res Dev Disabil. 32(2):419-436
